notification.name: Interface Down
notification.text-message:
OpenNMS Horizon

 Node: %nodelabel%

Object: %interface% (%interfaceresolve%)
Status: %severity%: Interface Down
Time: %time%
Log Message: %logmsg%
Log Description: %descr%
Instruction: %operinstruct%
Notification Id: %noticeid%
Source Event: %eventid%

Asset Information

Manufacturer: %asset[manufacturer]%
Model Number: %asset[modelNumber]%
Serial Number: %asset[serialNumber]%
OS: %asset[operatingSystem]%
Department: %asset[department]%
Address: %asset[address1]%
City with ZIP: %asset[city]% %asset[zip]%
notification.subject: [OPENNMS][%severity%][%noticeid%] :: %nodelabel% interface %interface% down
